question: "When Metro Pictures took over two other companies to form MGM, MGM adopted the former Goldwyn mascot ""Leo the Lion"" and what Goldwyn corporate motto?"
vanilla_rag_result: When Metro Pictures took over two other companies to form MGM, MGM adopted the former Goldwyn mascot "Leo the Lion" and the Goldwyn corporate motto "Ars Gratia Artis," which translates to "Art for art's sake."
